00037 lbann_callback_io::lbann_callback_io(
00038   std::unordered_set<uint> _layers) : layer_indices(_layers) {}

00054 // void lbann_callback_io::on_epoch_begin(model* m) {
00055 //   std::vector<Layer*>& layers = m->get_layers();
00056 //   for (size_t l = 0; l < layers.size(); ++l) {

00061 
00062 void lbann_callback_io::on_epoch_end(model* m) {
00063   lbann_comm* comm = m->get_comm();
00064   std::vector<Layer*>& layers = m->get_layers();
00065   for (size_t l = 0; l < layers.size(); ++l) {
00066     Layer* layer = layers[l];
00067     uint idx = layer->get_index();
00068     if (layer_indices.size() == 0 ||
00069         layer_indices.find(idx) != layer_indices.end()) {
00070 
00071       input_layer *input = (input_layer*) dynamic_cast<input_layer*> (layer);
00072       if(input != NULL) {
00073         cout << "Rank " << comm->get_model_rank() << "." << comm->get_rank_in_model() << " processed " 
00074              << input->get_num_samples_trained() << " training samples of " 
00075              << input->get_total_num_training_samples() << " ("
00076              << input->get_num_samples_trained() / m->get_cur_epoch() << " per epoch)" << endl;
00077       }
00078       target_layer *target = (target_layer*) dynamic_cast<target_layer*> (layer);
00079       if(target != NULL) {
00080         cout << "Rank " << comm->get_model_rank() << "." << comm->get_rank_in_model() << " processed " 
00081              << target->get_num_samples_trained() << " training labels of " 
00082              << target->get_total_num_training_samples() << " ("
00083              << target->get_num_samples_trained() / m->get_cur_epoch() << " per epoch)" << endl;
00084       }
00085     }    
00086   }
00087 }
00088 
00089 void lbann_callback_io::on_test_end(model* m) {
00090   lbann_comm* comm = m->get_comm();
00091   std::vector<Layer*>& layers = m->get_layers();
00092   for (size_t l = 0; l < layers.size(); ++l) {
00093     Layer* layer = layers[l];
00094     uint idx = layer->get_index();
00095     if (layer_indices.size() == 0 ||
00096         layer_indices.find(idx) != layer_indices.end()) {
00097 
00098       input_layer *input = (input_layer*) dynamic_cast<input_layer*> (layer);
00099       if(input != NULL) {
00100         cout << "Rank " << comm->get_model_rank() << "." << comm->get_rank_in_model() << " processed " 
00101              << input->get_num_samples_tested() << " test samples of " 
00102              << input->get_total_num_testing_samples() << " ("
00103              << input->get_num_samples_tested() / m->get_cur_epoch() << " per epoch)" << endl;
00104       }
00105       target_layer *target = (target_layer*) dynamic_cast<target_layer*> (layer);
00106       if(target != NULL) {
00107         cout << "Rank " << comm->get_model_rank() << "." << comm->get_rank_in_model() << " processed " 
00108              << target->get_num_samples_tested() << " test labels of " 
00109              << target->get_total_num_testing_samples() << " ("
00110              << target->get_num_samples_tested() / m->get_cur_epoch() << " per epoch)" << endl;
00111       }
00112     }    
00113   }
00114 }
00115
